name: Hard Favorite Movies Quiz / Test | Movies Grab Bag | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who played Boo Radley in 'To Kill a Mockingbird'?
In the Movie 'Field of Dreams', in the phrase 'If you build it He will come', Who is 'HE'?
questions.explanation:
Ray's Father.

	It is Ray's father, who he plays catch with at the end of the movie.

questions.text: Two of my favorite movies are 'The Shawshank Redemption' and 'Stand by Me', both of these movies were based on Novellas by which Author?
questions.correct: Stephen King & stephen king & king & King & Steven King & steven king
questions.explanation:
Stephen King & stephen king & king & King & Steven King & steven king.

	They are both from the Novel 'Different Seasons'.

questions.text: In the movie 'Dead Poets Society', what do the 'More Daring' students call Robin Williams character?
What holiday movie is based on the novel 'In God we Trust, All others pay cash'?
questions.explanation:
A Christmas Story.

	The Novel is by Jean Shepard.

questions.text: What TV show was Marisa Tomei who won the Best Supporting Actress for 'My Cousin Vinnie' a regular on?
questions.explanation:
A Different World.

	She played Denise's (Lisa Bonet) roomate in the shows first season.

questions.text: What movie starred Harrison Ford, Bonnie Bedelia, Brian Dennehy?
Who was the FIRST person to play Hannibal Lecter?
questions.explanation:
Brian Cox.

	Brian Cox originated the role in the movie 'Manhunter' before Anthony Hopkins played him in 'Silence of the Lambs'.

questions.text: What movie had Harrison Ford chasing after a one-armed man?
questions.correct: the fugitive & The Fugitive & fugitive & Fugitive
questions.explanation: the fugitive & The Fugitive & fugitive & Fugitive.

questions.text: In 'Toy Story', who was the voice of the Slinky Dog?
questions.explanation:
Jim Varney.

	Jim Varney, who died Feb 10, 2000 of lung cancer.
